## Variables

<a name="EnglishCharacterMapping"></a>EnglishCharacterMapping provides a mapping of English special characters to their ASCII equivalents.

```go
var EnglishCharacterMapping = map[string]string{
    "@": "at",
    "&": "and",
}
```

<a name="GermanCharacterMapping"></a>GermanCharacterMapping provides a mapping of German special characters to their ASCII equivalents.

```go
var GermanCharacterMapping = map[string]string{
    "ä": "ae",
    "ö": "oe",
    "ü": "ue",
    "ß": "ss",
    "Ä": "Ae",
    "Ö": "Oe",
    "Ü": "Ue",
    "@": "at",
    "&": "und",
}
```

<a name="SpanishCharacterMapping"></a>SpanishCharacterMapping provides a mapping of Spanish special characters to their ASCII equivalents.

```go
var SpanishCharacterMapping = map[string]string{
    "á": "a",
    "é": "e",
    "í": "i",
    "ó": "o",
    "ú": "u",
    "ñ": "n",
    "Á": "A",
    "É": "E",
    "Í": "I",
    "Ó": "O",
    "Ú": "U",
    "Ñ": "N",
    "@": "at",
    "&": "y",
    "ü": "u",
    "Ü": "U",
}
```

<a name="Config"></a>
## type Config

Config holds configuration options for the slugger.

```go
type Config struct {
    Lowercase         bool
    Separator         string
    MaxLength         int
    Language          Language
    SuffixStrategy    Suffix
    SuffixLength      int
    TimestampTimezone string
    CounterProvider   CounterProviderFunction
}
```

<a name="NewConfig"></a>
### func NewConfig

```go
func NewConfig(options ...ConfigOption) *Config
```

NewConfig creates a new Config with the provided options.

<a name="ConfigOption"></a>
## type ConfigOption

ConfigOption defines a function type for configuring the Slugger.

```go
type ConfigOption func(*Config)
```

<a name="CounterProviderFunction"></a>
## type CounterProviderFunction

CounterProviderFunction defines a function type that provides the next counter value.

```go
type CounterProviderFunction func() int
```

<a name="Language"></a>
## type Language

Language defines the language used for slugification.

```go
type Language int
```

<a name="English"></a>Supported languages for slugification.

```go
const (
    English Language = iota
    German
    Spanish
)
```

<a name="LanguageReplacer"></a>
## type LanguageReplacer

LanguageReplacer defines an interface for replacing special characters based on language.

```go
type LanguageReplacer interface {
    Replace(string) string
}
```

<a name="NewReplacer"></a>
### func NewReplacer

```go
func NewReplacer(language Language) LanguageReplacer
```

NewReplacer creates a LanguageReplacer based on the specified language.

<a name="Slugger"></a>
## type Slugger

Config holds configuration options for the Slugger service.

```go
type Slugger interface {
    Slugify(input string) string
}
```

<a name="New"></a>
### func New

```go
func New(c *Config) Slugger
```

New creates a new instance of Slugger with the provided configuration.

<a name="Suffix"></a>
## type Suffix

Suffix defines the type of suffix to append to slugs.

```go
type Suffix int
```

<a name="None"></a>Different suffix strategies.

```go
const (
    None Suffix = iota
    Numbered
    TimestampBased
    HashBased
)
```

<a name="Suffixer"></a>
## type Suffixer

Suffixer defines an interface for generating suffixes for slugs.

```go
type Suffixer interface {
    GenerateSuffix(string) string
}
```
